targets.rawSql:
SELECT jeva.date_activity AS time,
       COUNT(jeva.id) AS 'Вакансии'
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_activity AS jeva
  JOIN mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev ON jev.id = jeva.vacancy_id
  JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON js.id = jev.source_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(jeva.date_activity)
  AND js.title = '$source'
GROUP BY jeva.date_activity
ORDER BY jeva.date_activity

SELECT jeva.date_activity AS time,
       COUNT(DISTINCT je.title) AS "Количество раблотодателей с активными вакансиями"
FROM mod_jobs_employers AS je
    JOIN mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev ON je.id = jev.employer_id
    JOIN mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_activity AS jeva ON jev.id = jeva.vacancy_id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON js.id = jev.source_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(jeva.date_activity)
  AND js.title = '$source'
GROUP BY jeva.date_activity
ORDER BY jeva.date_activity;

SELECT jra.date_activity AS time,
       COUNT(jra.id) AS 'Резюме в активном поиске'
FROM mod_jobs_resume_activity AS jra
  JOIN mod_jobs_resume AS jr ON jr.id = jra.resume_id
  JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON js.id = jr.source_id
WHERE jr.search_status = 'active'
  AND $__timeFilter(jra.date_activity)
  AND js.title = '$source'
GROUP BY jra.date_activity
ORDER BY jra.date_activity;

SELECT jra.date_activity AS time,
       COUNT(jra.id) AS 'Резюме рассматривает предложения'
FROM mod_jobs_resume_activity AS jra
  JOIN mod_jobs_resume AS jr ON jr.id = jra.resume_id
  JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON js.id = jr.source_id
WHERE jr.search_status = 'passive'
  AND $__timeFilter(jra.date_activity)
  AND js.title = '$source'
GROUP BY jra.date_activity
ORDER BY jra.date_activity;

SELECT jra.date_activity AS time,
       MIN(jra.salary_byn) AS 'Резюме минимальная'
FROM mod_jobs_resume_activity AS jra
    JOIN mod_jobs_resume AS jr ON jra.resume_id = jr.id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON js.id = jr.source_id
WHERE jra.salary_byn >= 100
  AND js.title = '$source'
  AND jra.salary_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(jra.date_activity)
GROUP BY jra.date_activity
ORDER BY jra.date_activity

SELECT jra.date_activity AS time,
       MAX(jra.salary_byn) AS 'Резюме максимальная'
FROM mod_jobs_resume_activity AS jra
    JOIN mod_jobs_resume AS jr ON jra.resume_id = jr.id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON js.id = jr.source_id
WHERE jra.salary_byn >= 100
  AND jra.salary_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(jra.date_activity)
GROUP BY jra.date_activity
ORDER BY jra.date_activity

SELECT jra.date_activity AS time,
       AVG(jra.salary_byn) AS 'Резюме средняя'
FROM mod_jobs_resume_activity AS jra
    JOIN mod_jobs_resume AS jr ON jra.resume_id = jr.id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON js.id = jr.source_id
WHERE jra.salary_byn >= 100
  AND js.title = '$source'
  AND $__timeFilter(jra.date_activity)
GROUP BY jra.date_activity
ORDER BY jra.date_activity

SELECT jra.date_activity AS time,
       IF (FLOOR(COUNT(1) / 2) != CEILING(COUNT(1) / 2),
           REGEXP_SUBSTR(
               GROUP_CONCAT(jra.salary_byn ORDER BY jra.salary_byn SEPARATOR ','),
               '[0-9\.]+', 1, COUNT(1) / 2
           ) + 0,
           (
               REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                   GROUP_CONCAT(jra.salary_byn ORDER BY jra.salary_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                   '[0-9\.]+', 1, (COUNT(1) / 2) - 1)
               +
               REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                   GROUP_CONCAT(jra.salary_byn ORDER BY jra.salary_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                   '[0-9\.]+', 1, COUNT(1) / 2 + 1)
           ) / 2
       ) AS 'Резюме медиана'
FROM mod_jobs_resume_activity AS jra
    JOIN mod_jobs_resume AS jr ON jra.resume_id = jr.id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON js.id = jr.source_id
WHERE jra.salary_byn >= 100
  AND js.title = '$source'
  AND jra.salary_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(jra.date_activity)
GROUP BY jra.date_activity
ORDER BY jra.date_activity

SELECT jeva.date_activity AS time,
       MIN(jeva.salary_min_byn) AS 'Вакансии минимальная'
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_activity AS jeva
    JOIN mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev ON jeva.vacancy_id = jev.id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON jev.source_id = js.id
WHERE jeva.salary_min_byn >= 100
  AND js.title = '$source'
  AND jeva.salary_min_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(jeva.date_activity)
GROUP BY jeva.date_activity
ORDER BY jeva.date_activity

SELECT jeva.date_activity AS time,
       MAX(jeva.salary_max_byn) AS 'Вакансии максимальная'
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_activity AS jeva
    JOIN mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev ON jeva.vacancy_id = jev.id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON jev.source_id = js.id
WHERE jeva.salary_min_byn >= 100
  AND js.title = '$source'
  AND jeva.salary_max_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(jeva.date_activity)
GROUP BY jeva.date_activity
ORDER BY jeva.date_activity

SELECT jeva.date_activity AS time,
       AVG(jeva.salary_min_byn) AS 'Вакансии средняя'
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_activity AS jeva
    JOIN mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev ON jeva.vacancy_id = jev.id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON jev.source_id = js.id
WHERE jeva.salary_min_byn >= 100
  AND js.title = '$source'
  AND jeva.salary_min_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(jeva.date_activity)
GROUP BY jeva.date_activity
ORDER BY jeva.date_activity

SELECT jeva.date_activity AS time,
       IF (FLOOR(COUNT(1) / 2) != CEILING(COUNT(1) / 2),
           REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                   GROUP_CONCAT(jeva.salary_min_byn ORDER BY jeva.salary_min_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                   '[0-9\.]+', 1, COUNT(1) / 2
           ) + 0,
           (
               REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                   GROUP_CONCAT(jeva.salary_min_byn ORDER BY jeva.salary_min_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                   '[0-9\.]+', 1, (COUNT(1) / 2) - 1)
               +
               REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                   GROUP_CONCAT(jeva.salary_min_byn ORDER BY jeva.salary_min_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                   '[0-9\.]+', 1, COUNT(1) / 2 + 1)
           ) / 2
       ) AS 'Вакансии медиана'
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_activity AS jeva
    JOIN mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev ON jeva.vacancy_id = jev.id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON jev.source_id = js.id
WHERE jeva.salary_min_byn >= 300
  AND js.title = '$source'
  AND jeva.salary_min_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(jeva.date_activity)
GROUP BY jeva.date_activity
ORDER BY jeva.date_activity;

SELECT jeva.date_activity AS time,
       COUNT(jeva.id) AS 'Вакансии'
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_activity AS jeva
  JOIN mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev ON jev.id = jeva.vacancy_id
  JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON js.id = jev.source_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(jeva.date_activity)
  AND js.title = '$source'
GROUP BY jeva.date_activity
ORDER BY jeva.date_activity

SELECT jra.date_activity AS time,
       COUNT(jra.id) AS 'Резюме'
FROM mod_jobs_resume_activity AS jra
  JOIN mod_jobs_resume AS jr ON jr.id = jra.resume_id
  JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON js.id = jr.source_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(jra.date_activity)
  AND js.title = '$source'
GROUP BY jra.date_activity
ORDER BY jra.date_activity;

SELECT jeva.date_activity AS time,
       IF (FLOOR(COUNT(1) / 2) != CEILING(COUNT(1) / 2),
           REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                   GROUP_CONCAT(jeva.salary_min_byn ORDER BY jeva.salary_min_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                   '[0-9\.]+', 1, COUNT(1) / 2
           ) + 0,
           (
               REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                   GROUP_CONCAT(jeva.salary_min_byn ORDER BY jeva.salary_min_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                   '[0-9\.]+', 1, (COUNT(1) / 2) - 1)
               +
               REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                   GROUP_CONCAT(jeva.salary_min_byn ORDER BY jeva.salary_min_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                   '[0-9\.]+', 1, COUNT(1) / 2 + 1)
           ) / 2
       ) AS 'Вакансии медиана',
       jev.region
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_activity AS jeva
    JOIN mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev ON jev.id = jeva.vacancy_id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON jev.source_id = js.id
WHERE js.title = '$source'
  AND jeva.salary_min_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND jeva.salary_min_byn >= 100
  AND $__timeFilter(jeva.date_activity)
GROUP BY jeva.date_activity, jev.region
ORDER BY jeva.date_activity;

SELECT jrs.date_activity AS time,
       AVG(jr.age) AS 'Средний возраст'
FROM mod_jobs_resume AS jr
    JOIN mod_jobs_resume_activity AS jrs ON jr.id = jrs.resume_id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON js.id = jr.source_id
WHERE js.title = '$source'
  AND $__timeFilter(jrs.date_activity)
GROUP BY jrs.date_activity
ORDER BY jrs.date_activity;

SELECT NOW() AS time,
       count(DISTINCT jev.id) AS count,
       'до 500 BYN'
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON jev.source_id = js.id
WHERE js.title = '$source'
  AND jev.date_close IS NULL
  AND jev.salary_min_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND jev.salary_min_byn < 500
ORDER BY 2 DESC;

SELECT NOW() AS time,
       count(DISTINCT jev.id) AS count,
       '500 - 1000 BYN'
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON jev.source_id = js.id
WHERE js.title = '$source'
  AND jev.date_close IS NULL
  AND jev.salary_min_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND (jev.salary_min_byn >= 500 AND jev.salary_min_byn < 1000)
ORDER BY 2 DESC;

SELECT NOW() AS time,
       count(DISTINCT jev.id) AS count,
       '1000 - 2000 BYN'
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON jev.source_id = js.id
WHERE js.title = '$source'
  AND jev.date_close IS NULL
  AND jev.salary_min_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND (jev.salary_min_byn >= 1000 AND jev.salary_min_byn < 2000)
ORDER BY 2 DESC;

SELECT NOW() AS time,
       count(DISTINCT jev.id) AS count,
       '2000 - 3000 BYN'
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON jev.source_id = js.id
WHERE js.title = '$source'
  AND jev.date_close IS NULL
  AND jev.salary_min_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND (jev.salary_min_byn >= 2000 AND jev.salary_min_byn < 3000)
ORDER BY 2 DESC;

SELECT NOW() AS time,
       count(DISTINCT jev.id) AS count,
       '3000 - 5000 BYN'
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON jev.source_id = js.id
WHERE js.title = '$source'
  AND jev.date_close IS NULL
  AND jev.salary_min_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND (jev.salary_min_byn >= 3000 AND jev.salary_min_byn < 5000)
ORDER BY 2 DESC;

SELECT NOW() AS time,
       count(DISTINCT jev.id) AS count,
       'от 5000 BYN'
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON jev.source_id = js.id
WHERE js.title = '$source'
  AND jev.date_close IS NULL
  AND jev.salary_min_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND jev.salary_min_byn >= 5000
ORDER BY 2 DESC;

SELECT NOW() AS time,
       count(DISTINCT jr.id) AS count,
       'до 500 BYN'
FROM mod_jobs_resume AS jr
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON jr.source_id = js.id
WHERE js.title = '$source'
  AND jr.date_close IS NULL
  AND jr.salary_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND jr.salary_byn < 500
ORDER BY 2 DESC;

SELECT NOW() AS time,
       count(DISTINCT jr.id) AS count,
       '500 - 1000 BYN'
FROM mod_jobs_resume AS jr
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON jr.source_id = js.id
WHERE js.title = '$source'
  AND jr.date_close IS NULL
  AND jr.salary_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND (jr.salary_byn >= 500 AND jr.salary_byn < 1000)
ORDER BY 2 DESC;

SELECT NOW() AS time,
       count(DISTINCT jr.id) AS count,
       '1000 - 2000 BYN'
FROM mod_jobs_resume AS jr
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON jr.source_id = js.id
WHERE js.title = '$source'
  AND jr.date_close IS NULL
  AND jr.salary_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND (jr.salary_byn >= 1000 AND jr.salary_byn < 2000)
ORDER BY 2 DESC;

SELECT NOW() AS time,
       count(DISTINCT jr.id) AS count,
       '2000 - 3000 BYN'
FROM mod_jobs_resume AS jr
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON jr.source_id = js.id
WHERE js.title = '$source'
  AND jr.date_close IS NULL
  AND jr.salary_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND (jr.salary_byn >= 2000 AND jr.salary_byn < 3000)
ORDER BY 2 DESC;

SELECT NOW() AS time,
       count(DISTINCT jr.id) AS count,
       '3000 - 5000 BYN'
FROM mod_jobs_resume AS jr
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON jr.source_id = js.id
WHERE js.title = '$source'
  AND jr.date_close IS NULL
  AND jr.salary_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND (jr.salary_byn >= 3000 AND jr.salary_byn < 5000)
ORDER BY 2 DESC;

SELECT NOW() AS time,
       count(DISTINCT jr.id) AS count,
       'от 5000 BYN'
FROM mod_jobs_resume AS jr
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON jr.source_id = js.id
WHERE js.title = '$source'
  AND jr.date_close IS NULL
  AND jr.salary_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND jr.salary_byn >= 5000
ORDER BY 2 DESC;

SELECT NOW() AS time,
       count(jr.title) AS count,
       CONCAT(jr.title, ' - ', ROUND(AVG(jr.salary_byn)), ' byn')
FROM mod_jobs_resume AS jr
    JOIN mod_jobs_resume_activity AS jra ON jra.resume_id = jr.id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON js.id = jr.source_id
WHERE js.title = '$source'
  AND jr.date_close IS NULL
GROUP BY REPLACE(jr.title, '-', '')
ORDER BY 2 DESC
LIMIT 30;

SELECT NOW() AS time,
       count(jev.title) AS count,
       CONCAT(jev.title, ' - ', ROUND(AVG(jev.salary_min_byn)), ' byn')
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev
    JOIN mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_activity AS jeva ON jeva.vacancy_id = jev.id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON jev.source_id = js.id
WHERE js.title = '$source'
  AND jev.date_close IS NULL
GROUP BY REPLACE(jev.title, '-', '')
ORDER BY 2 DESC
LIMIT 30;

SELECT jra.date_activity AS time,
       IF (FLOOR(COUNT(1) / 2) != CEILING(COUNT(1) / 2),
           REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                   GROUP_CONCAT(jra.salary_byn ORDER BY jra.salary_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                   '[0-9\.]+', 1, COUNT(1) / 2
               ) + 0,
           (
                   REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                           GROUP_CONCAT(jra.salary_byn ORDER BY jra.salary_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                           '[0-9\.]+', 1, (COUNT(1) / 2) - 1)
                   +
                   REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                           GROUP_CONCAT(jra.salary_byn ORDER BY jra.salary_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                           '[0-9\.]+', 1, COUNT(1) / 2 + 1)
               ) / 2
           ) AS 'Количество',
       jp.title
FROM mod_jobs_resume_activity AS jra
    JOIN mod_jobs_resume_professions AS jrp ON jrp.resume_id = jra.resume_id
    JOIN mod_jobs_professions AS jp ON jrp.profession_id = jp.id
    JOIN mod_jobs_resume AS jr ON jr.id = jra.resume_id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON js.id = jr.source_id
WHERE jra.salary_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND js.title = '$source'
  AND $__timeFilter(jra.date_activity)
GROUP BY jra.date_activity, jp.name
ORDER BY jra.date_activity

SELECT jeva.date_activity AS time,
       IF (FLOOR(COUNT(1) / 2) != CEILING(COUNT(1) / 2),
           REGEXP_SUBSTR(
               GROUP_CONCAT(jeva.salary_min_byn ORDER BY jeva.salary_min_byn SEPARATOR ','),
               '[0-9\.]+', 1, COUNT(1) / 2
           ) + 0,
           (
               REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                       GROUP_CONCAT(jeva.salary_min_byn ORDER BY jeva.salary_min_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                       '[0-9\.]+', 1, (COUNT(1) / 2) - 1)
               +
               REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                       GROUP_CONCAT(jeva.salary_min_byn ORDER BY jeva.salary_min_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                       '[0-9\.]+', 1, COUNT(1) / 2 + 1)
           ) / 2
       ) AS 'Количество',
       jp.title
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_activity AS jeva
    JOIN mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev ON jeva.vacancy_id = jev.id
    JOIN mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_professions AS jevp ON jev.id = jevp.vacancy_id
    JOIN mod_jobs_professions AS jp ON jevp.profession_id = jp.id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON js.id = jev.source_id
WHERE jeva.salary_min_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND js.title = '$source'
  AND $__timeFilter(jeva.date_activity)
GROUP BY jeva.date_activity, jp.name
ORDER BY jeva.date_activity;

SELECT js.date_summary AS time,
       js.total_vacancies AS "Всего вакансий"
FROM mod_jobs_summary AS js
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js2 ON js.source_id = js2.id
WHERE js2.title = '$source'
  AND $__timeFilter(js.date_summary)
GROUP BY js.date_summary
ORDER BY js.date_summary;

SELECT js.date_summary AS time,
       js.total_resume AS "Всего резюме"
FROM mod_jobs_summary AS js
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js2 ON js.source_id = js2.id
WHERE js2.title = '$source'
  AND $__timeFilter(js.date_summary)
GROUP BY js.date_summary
ORDER BY js.date_summary;

SELECT js.date_summary AS time,
       js.total_employers AS "Всего работодателей"
FROM mod_jobs_summary AS js
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js2 ON js.source_id = js2.id
WHERE js2.title = '$source'
  AND $__timeFilter(js.date_summary)
GROUP BY js.date_summary
ORDER BY js.date_summary;

SELECT js.date_summary AS time,
       js.total_week_invites AS "Отправлено приглашений в неделю"
FROM mod_jobs_summary AS js
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js2 ON js.source_id = js2.id
WHERE js2.title = '$source'
  AND $__timeFilter(js.date_summary)
GROUP BY js.date_summary
ORDER BY js.date_summary;

panels.title: Отправлено приглашений в неделю [по заявлению источника]

targets.rawSql:
SELECT jps.date_summary AS time,
       jps.total_people AS "Количество"
FROM mod_jobs_professions_summary AS jps
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON js.id = jps.source_id
    JOIN mod_jobs_professions AS jp ON jps.profession_id = jp.id
WHERE $__timeFilter(jps.date_summary)
  AND js.title = '$source'
  AND jp.title = $profession
GROUP BY jps.date_summary, jp.name
ORDER BY jps.date_summary;

SELECT jeva.date_activity AS time,
       COUNT(jeva.id) AS 'Вакансии'
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_activity AS jeva
    JOIN mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev ON jev.id = jeva.vacancy_id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON js.id = jev.source_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(jeva.date_activity)
  AND js.title = '$source'
  AND (SELECT 1
       FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_professions AS jevp
           JOIN mod_jobs_professions AS jp ON jevp.profession_id = jp.id
       WHERE jevp.vacancy_id = jeva.vacancy_id
         AND jp.title = $profession)
GROUP BY jeva.date_activity
ORDER BY jeva.date_activity

SELECT jra.date_activity AS time,
       COUNT(jra.id) AS 'Резюме в активном поиске'
FROM mod_jobs_resume_activity AS jra
    JOIN mod_jobs_resume AS jr ON jr.id = jra.resume_id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON js.id = jr.source_id
WHERE jr.search_status = 'active'
  AND js.title = '$source'
  AND $__timeFilter(jra.date_activity)
  AND (SELECT 1
       FROM mod_jobs_resume_professions AS jrp
           JOIN mod_jobs_professions AS jp ON jrp.profession_id = jp.id
       WHERE jrp.resume_id = jra.resume_id
         AND jp.title = $profession)
GROUP BY jra.date_activity
ORDER BY jra.date_activity;

SELECT jra.date_activity AS time,
       COUNT(jra.id) AS 'Резюме рассматривает предложения'
FROM mod_jobs_resume_activity AS jra
    JOIN mod_jobs_resume AS jr ON jr.id = jra.resume_id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON js.id = jr.source_id
WHERE jr.search_status = 'passive'
  AND js.title = '$source'
  AND $__timeFilter(jra.date_activity)
  AND (SELECT 1
       FROM mod_jobs_resume_professions AS jrp
           JOIN mod_jobs_professions AS jp ON jrp.profession_id = jp.id
       WHERE jrp.resume_id = jra.resume_id
         AND jp.title = $profession)
GROUP BY jra.date_activity
ORDER BY jra.date_activity;

SELECT NOW() AS time,
       count(DISTINCT jev.id) AS count,
       'до 500 BYN'
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON jev.source_id = js.id
WHERE js.title = '$source'
  AND (SELECT 1
       FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_professions AS jevp
           JOIN mod_jobs_professions AS jp ON jevp.profession_id = jp.id
       WHERE jevp.vacancy_id = jev.id
         AND jp.title = $profession)
  AND jev.date_close IS NULL
  AND jev.salary_min_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND jev.salary_min_byn < 500
ORDER BY 2 DESC;

SELECT NOW() AS time,
       count(DISTINCT jev.id) AS count,
       '500 - 1000 BYN'
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON jev.source_id = js.id
WHERE js.title = '$source'
  AND (SELECT 1
       FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_professions AS jevp
           JOIN mod_jobs_professions AS jp ON jevp.profession_id = jp.id
       WHERE jevp.vacancy_id = jev.id
         AND jp.title = $profession)
  AND jev.date_close IS NULL
  AND jev.salary_min_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND (jev.salary_min_byn >= 500 AND jev.salary_min_byn < 1000)
ORDER BY 2 DESC;

SELECT NOW() AS time,
       count(DISTINCT jev.id) AS count,
       '1000 - 2000 BYN'
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON jev.source_id = js.id
WHERE js.title = '$source'
  AND (SELECT 1
       FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_professions AS jevp
           JOIN mod_jobs_professions AS jp ON jevp.profession_id = jp.id

SELECT jeva.date_activity AS time,
       AVG(jeva.salary_min_byn) AS 'Вакансии средняя'
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_activity AS jeva
    JOIN mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev ON jev.id = jeva.vacancy_id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON js.id = jev.source_id
WHERE jeva.salary_min_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND js.title = '$source'
  AND $__timeFilter(jeva.date_activity)
  AND (SELECT 1
       FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_professions AS jevp
            JOIN mod_jobs_professions AS jp ON jevp.profession_id = jp.id
       WHERE jevp.vacancy_id = jeva.vacancy_id
         AND jp.title = $profession)
GROUP BY jeva.date_activity
ORDER BY jeva.date_activity

SELECT jra.date_activity AS time,
       AVG(jra.salary_byn) AS 'Резюме средняя'
FROM mod_jobs_resume_activity AS jra
    JOIN mod_jobs_resume AS jr ON jr.id = jra.resume_id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON js.id = jr.source_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(jra.date_activity)
  AND js.title = '$source'
  AND (SELECT 1
       FROM mod_jobs_resume_professions AS jrp
            JOIN mod_jobs_professions AS jp ON jrp.profession_id = jp.id
       WHERE jrp.resume_id = jra.resume_id
         AND jp.title = $profession)
GROUP BY jra.date_activity
ORDER BY jra.date_activity

SELECT jra.date_activity AS time,
       IF (FLOOR(COUNT(1) / 2) != CEILING(COUNT(1) / 2),
           REGEXP_SUBSTR(
               GROUP_CONCAT(jra.salary_byn ORDER BY jra.salary_byn SEPARATOR ','),
               '[0-9\.]+', 1, COUNT(1) / 2
           ) + 0,
           (
               REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                   GROUP_CONCAT(jra.salary_byn ORDER BY jra.salary_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                   '[0-9\.]+', 1, (COUNT(1) / 2) - 1)
               +
               REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                   GROUP_CONCAT(jra.salary_byn ORDER BY jra.salary_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                   '[0-9\.]+', 1, COUNT(1) / 2 + 1)
           ) / 2
       ) AS 'Резюме медиана'
FROM mod_jobs_resume_activity AS jra
    JOIN mod_jobs_resume AS jr ON jr.id = jra.resume_id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON js.id = jr.source_id
WHERE jra.salary_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(jra.date_activity)
  AND js.title = '$source'
  AND (SELECT 1
       FROM mod_jobs_resume_professions AS jrp
            JOIN mod_jobs_professions AS jp ON jrp.profession_id = jp.id
       WHERE jrp.resume_id = jra.resume_id
         AND jp.title = $profession)
GROUP BY jra.date_activity
ORDER BY jra.date_activity

SELECT jeva.date_activity AS time,
       IF (FLOOR(COUNT(1) / 2) != CEILING(COUNT(1) / 2),
           REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                   GROUP_CONCAT(jeva.salary_min_byn ORDER BY jeva.salary_min_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                   '[0-9\.]+', 1, COUNT(1) / 2
           ) + 0,
           (
               REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                   GROUP_CONCAT(jeva.salary_min_byn ORDER BY jeva.salary_min_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                   '[0-9\.]+', 1, (COUNT(1) / 2) - 1)
               +
               REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                   GROUP_CONCAT(jeva.salary_min_byn ORDER BY jeva.salary_min_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                   '[0-9\.]+', 1, COUNT(1) / 2 + 1)
           ) / 2
       ) AS 'Вакансии медиана'
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_activity AS jeva
    JOIN mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev ON jev.id = jeva.vacancy_id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON js.id = jev.source_id
WHERE jeva.salary_min_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND js.title = '$source'
  AND (SELECT 1
       FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_professions AS jevp
            JOIN mod_jobs_professions AS jp ON jevp.profession_id = jp.id
       WHERE jevp.vacancy_id = jeva.vacancy_id
         AND jp.title = $profession)
GROUP BY jeva.date_activity
ORDER BY jeva.date_activity;

SELECT jeva.date_activity AS time,
       IF (FLOOR(COUNT(1) / 2) != CEILING(COUNT(1) / 2),
           REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                   GROUP_CONCAT(jeva.salary_min_byn ORDER BY jeva.salary_min_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                   '[0-9\.]+', 1, COUNT(1) / 2
           ) + 0,
           (
               REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                   GROUP_CONCAT(jeva.salary_min_byn ORDER BY jeva.salary_min_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                   '[0-9\.]+', 1, (COUNT(1) / 2) - 1)
               +
               REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                   GROUP_CONCAT(jeva.salary_min_byn ORDER BY jeva.salary_min_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                   '[0-9\.]+', 1, COUNT(1) / 2 + 1)
           ) / 2
       ) AS 'Вакансии медиана общее'
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_activity AS jeva
    JOIN mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev ON jeva.vacancy_id = jev.id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON jev.source_id = js.id
WHERE jeva.salary_min_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND js.title = '$source'
  AND $__timeFilter(jeva.date_activity)
GROUP BY jeva.date_activity
ORDER BY jeva.date_activity;

SELECT jeva.date_activity AS time,
       COUNT(jeva.id) AS 'Вакансии'
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_activity AS jeva
WHERE $__timeFilter(jeva.date_activity)
  AND (SELECT 1
       FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_categories AS jevc
           JOIN mod_jobs_categories AS jc ON jevc.category_id = jc.id
       WHERE jevc.vacancy_id = jeva.vacancy_id
         AND jc.title = $categories)
GROUP BY jeva.date_activity
ORDER BY jeva.date_activity;

SELECT jra.date_activity AS time,
       COUNT(jra.id) AS 'Резюме в активном поиске'
FROM mod_jobs_resume_activity AS jra
    JOIN mod_jobs_resume AS jr ON jr.id = jra.resume_id
WHERE jr.search_status = 'active'
  AND $__timeFilter(jra.date_activity)
  AND (SELECT 1
       FROM mod_jobs_resume_categories AS jrc
           JOIN mod_jobs_categories AS jc ON jrc.category_id = jc.id
       WHERE jrc.resume_id = jra.resume_id
         AND jc.title = $categories)
GROUP BY jra.date_activity
ORDER BY jra.date_activity;

SELECT jra.date_activity AS time,
       COUNT(jra.id) AS 'Резюме рассматривает предложения'
FROM mod_jobs_resume_activity AS jra
    JOIN mod_jobs_resume AS jr ON jr.id = jra.resume_id
WHERE jr.search_status = 'passive'
  AND $__timeFilter(jra.date_activity)
  AND (SELECT 1
       FROM mod_jobs_resume_categories AS jrc
           JOIN mod_jobs_categories AS jc ON jrc.category_id = jc.id
       WHERE jrc.resume_id = jra.resume_id
         AND jc.title = $categories)
GROUP BY jra.date_activity
ORDER BY jra.date_activity;

       IF (FLOOR(COUNT(1) / 2) != CEILING(COUNT(1) / 2),
           REGEXP_SUBSTR(
               GROUP_CONCAT(jra.salary_byn ORDER BY jra.salary_byn SEPARATOR ','),

       ) AS 'Вакансии медиана'
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_activity AS jeva
WHERE jeva.salary_min_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND (SELECT 1
       FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_categories AS jevc
            JOIN mod_jobs_categories AS jc ON jevc.category_id = jc.id
       WHERE jevc.vacancy_id = jeva.vacancy_id
         AND jc.title = $categories)
GROUP BY jeva.date_activity
ORDER BY jeva.date_activity;

SELECT jeva.date_activity AS time,
       AVG(jeva.salary_min_byn) AS 'Вакансии средняя'
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_activity AS jeva
WHERE jeva.salary_min_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(jeva.date_activity)
  AND (SELECT 1
       FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_categories AS jevc
            JOIN mod_jobs_categories AS jc ON jevc.category_id = jc.id
       WHERE jevc.vacancy_id = jeva.vacancy_id
         AND jc.title = $categories)
GROUP BY jeva.date_activity
ORDER BY jeva.date_activity

SELECT jra.date_activity AS time,
       AVG(jra.salary_byn) AS 'Резюме средняя'
FROM mod_jobs_resume_activity AS jra
WHERE $__timeFilter(jra.date_activity)
  AND (SELECT 1
       FROM mod_jobs_resume_categories AS jrc
            JOIN mod_jobs_categories AS jc ON jrc.category_id = jc.id
       WHERE jrc.resume_id = jra.resume_id
         AND jc.title = $categories)
GROUP BY jra.date_activity
ORDER BY jra.date_activity

SELECT jeva.date_activity AS time,
       IF (FLOOR(COUNT(1) / 2) != CEILING(COUNT(1) / 2),
           REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                   GROUP_CONCAT(jeva.salary_min_byn ORDER BY jeva.salary_min_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                   '[0-9\.]+', 1, COUNT(1) / 2
           ) + 0,
           (
               REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                   GROUP_CONCAT(jeva.salary_min_byn ORDER BY jeva.salary_min_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                   '[0-9\.]+', 1, (COUNT(1) / 2) - 1)
               +
               REGEXP_SUBSTR(
                   GROUP_CONCAT(jeva.salary_min_byn ORDER BY jeva.salary_min_byn SEPARATOR ','),
                   '[0-9\.]+', 1, COUNT(1) / 2 + 1)
           ) / 2
       ) AS 'Вакансии медиана общее'
FROM mod_jobs_employers_vacancies_activity AS jeva
    JOIN mod_jobs_employers_vacancies AS jev ON jeva.vacancy_id = jev.id
    JOIN mod_jobs_sources AS js ON jev.source_id = js.id
WHERE jeva.salary_min_byn IS NOT NULL
  AND js.title = '$source'
  AND $__timeFilter(jeva.date_activity)
GROUP BY jeva.date_activity
ORDER BY jeva.date_activity;

list.label: Регион
list.name: region
list.query: Минск, Минская обл., Витебская обл., Гродненская обл., Могилевская обл., Гомельская обл., Брестская обл.
